item.description:
The Connecticut Coalition to Stop Indefinite Detention's focus is the indefinite detention portions of the National Defense Authorization Act. These are activists with whom many of us have had little contact because they associate more with left leaning groups like the Green Party, ANSWER, and Occupy Wall Street. But, there is no reason why we can't work with them on issues like this.

 

Enter through the door labeled "Men's Entrance", take off your shoes and go down the stairs.

 


http://ctstopindefinitedetention.com/
item.name: Connecticut Coalition to Stop Indefinite Detention Monthly Meeting
